title: Tencent’s AI Lag Fuels $173 Billion Stock Rout as Rivals Thrive
description: China’s most-valued company is losing favor with equity investors on concern it is falling behind in the nation’s increasingly competitive artificial intelligence race.
content:
China’s most-valued company is losing favor with equity investors on concern it is falling behind in the nation’s increasingly competitive artificial intelligence race.
Shares of Tencent Holdings Ltd. have slumped nearly 11% in Hong Kong this year, t... [328 chars]

title: Applied Materials Profit Rises on Soaring AI Demand -- Update
description:
By Katherine Hamilton
Applied Materials logged higher profit in the fiscal first quarter as artificial intelligence computing demand soars.
Profit jumped 70% to $2.03 billion, or $2.54 a...
content:
By Katherine Hamilton
Applied Materials logged higher profit in the fiscal first quarter as artificial intelligence computing demand soars.
Profit jumped 70% to $2.03 billion, or $2.54 a share, in the quarter ended in January, compared with $1.19 bil... [1854 chars]

title: Wall St sinks as tech rout deepens on AI angst
description: Wall Street indices fell sharply on Thursday, with the technology-heavy Nasdaq slumping 2%, as investors intensified their selloff of tech shares and fled transport stocks amid worries about artificial intelligence disruption.
content:
NEW YORK: Wall Street indices fell sharply on Thursday, with the technology-heavy Nasdaq slumping 2%, as investors intensified their selloff of tech shares and fled transport stocks amid worries about artificial intelligence disruption.
The S&P 500 a... [4283 chars]

title: $380B valuation for AI company
description: Artificial intelligence company Anthropic says it is now valued at $380 billion, cementing its position alongside rival OpenAI and Elon Musk’s SpaceX in a trio of the world’s most valuable startups that investors will be watching closely this year to see if they will become publicly traded on Wall Street.
